channel.title: Pages on Voxbox
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Voxbox

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Matteo La Cognata. I am a Telecommunication Engineer with a passion for software, nature, music & cooking. I am also a dad, and I love my family and my cat. what is Voxbox Voxbox is a collection of open-source and propietary components I developed to orchestrate telephony services on a single or clustered group of servers, tailored to the carrier wholesale market. Voxbox is built for Debian servers with Freeswitch, PostgreSQL and Ruby.
